description:
There’s just something about redheads with muscles!

“I’ve always had big legs,” Lee said as he flexed his massive quads. “But I’ve been hitting them pretty hard lately!”

He also has a beautiful chest!

Lee was really fun to be around. He was really excited to be here and his enthusiasm was contagious!

“I’m going to shoot a lot today!” he said with a laugh. “I can feel it.”

His predication was right on... he shot not one but two huge loads!
title: Lee
